CustomField.description: Users populate this field with the sum of any additional interest-bearing deposit account balances for all new deposit products an FI originates in the deal outside of nCino. By default, it is blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this field to indicate any additional interest-bearing deposit account balance for all new deposit products an FI originates in the deal outside of nCino.
CustomField.label: New Interest Bearing Deposit Balance
